description: An automated development loop that fetches GitHub issues, uses Jules CLI to implement fixes, and manages PRs.

tasks.description: Retrieve the highest priority open issue from GitHub.
acceptance_criteria: Script successfully calls 'gh issue list'
Script parses JSON output and extracts issue title, body, and number
Script handles case with no open issues

tasks.description: Invoke Jules CLI to perform the work.
acceptance_criteria: Script calls 'jules edit' with issue details
Script captures Jules CLI output to find the PR link or branch info

tasks.description: Automatically merge the PR created by Jules.
acceptance_criteria: Script calls 'gh pr merge' on the correct PR
Local environment is cleaned up (switched back to main)

tasks.description: Run the cycle continuously with a configurable sleep interval.
acceptance_criteria: Script runs in a while loop
Loop respects a SLEEP_INTERVAL environment variable

tasks.description: Option to pause for manual approval before merging.
acceptance_criteria: CLI flag --manual enables approval step
Approval can be given via CLI prompt or GitHub label

tasks.description: Handle failures in Jules execution or PR merges.
acceptance_criteria: Retries or skips failing issues
Logs errors to a local log file

tasks.description: Use LLM to generate new issues if the backlog is empty, with full code context.
acceptance_criteria: Connects to OpenRouter API
Analyzes repo context to suggest relevant features
Creates new GitHub Issues via 'gh issue create'
Avoids duplicating existing open or closed issues

tasks.description: Bot for updates and remote management.
acceptance_criteria: Sends notifications on task start/completion
Provides links to PRs and Vercel previews
Allows merge approval via Telegram buttons

tasks.description: Dockerize the orchestrator for VPS deployment.
acceptance_criteria: Dockerfile successfully builds environment with gh and jules CLIs
Orchestrator runs reliably in a containerized environment

unit_tests: Test command string generation for 'gh' and 'jules'
integration_tests: Verify 'gh' CLI interaction in a mock repo
Verify Jules CLI call structure and output parsing
e2e_tests: Run a full loop on a test repository from issue selection to PR merge
